trans-unit.source: View is based on a snapshot of today's XCH price, a pool luck and a constant total network space. Plots of size k=32 (101.4 GiB).
Average effort to farm a block in the last 30 days.
Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days. Estimated value (XCH) a farmer would get per TiB per day.

The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
Pool space when the block has been won.
Profitability based on blocks farmed on last 30 days, based on your farm space.

Farmer took too long to validate the partial proof of space. Make sure your proof of space lookups are fast, and network connectivity is good. Response must happen in less than 25 seconds. Your NAS or network farming can be an issue. This happens when your disks are in use (plotting) or when waking up.
Same partial proof was sent more than once.
Signage point is invalid or was not found in pool's node blockchain.
The proof sent is not good enough for the current difficulty of the farmer.
Plot NFT (pool smart contract) no longer in the pool. Farmer left the pool.

The effort that was required to farm the block. 100% is the expected estimated time to win. Lower than 100% means we farmed the block before the estimation. Higher than 100% means we took longer than anticipated.
No blocks found by this farmer!
farmer doesn't exist, has left and/or has been removed.
Learn how to set name here.
Use above link to refer people to this pool. They will be required to join the pool and login to the website to confirm the referral.
No referrals found for this farmer!
Failed to authenticate! Check your URL and try again.
What are non-portable (OG) and portable plots (NFT)?

Can I switch from/to your pool whenever I want?
How many portable plots do I need to join the pool?
How to set name in explorer? (alias)
Do you have any other questions?
Payouts will happen within 5 minutes of the farmed block. These terms are subjected to change and will be communicated 1 week prior to the change in this website and on Discord channel.
A reward of 1.75 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers, 0 XCH (nothing) is kept to the pool.
If a reward of 1.75 XCH is found, only 1% of that, 0.0175 will be kept to the pool as a fee. The remaining 1.7325 XCH will be distributed to pool farmers.

We use PPLNS (Pay Per Last N Shares) to distribute rewards. When a block is won, we look at the valid partials (shares) submitted by all users in the pool since last payout and distribute the reward value based on your share among all farmers in the pool. In our case Last N Shares refers to partials since last payout. We believe this system is far more fair for less frequent rewards (when Last N Shares means only last few hours), since people contributing for more time will get more rewards. Once our estimated time to win gets below 48 hours we plan on changing the Last N Shares to 48 hours of valid partials.
Make sure you are running official Chia client 1.2.0 or later.
Sync your full node and wallet
before joining the pool, your node and wallet must be fully synchronized with Chia blockchain
you are going to need 1 mojo (0.000000000001 XCH) which you can get through our faucet service on Discord channel or through Faucet website:
go to the “Pool” tab, and click on “Join the Pool”
choose “Connect to pool” and enter the url: https://pool.openchia.io (exactly, no ending slash) then wait for pool description to appear
click the “Create” button. In the next couple of minutes, the Plot NFT will be created, and it will appear in your “Pool” tab
You can now start creating Plots in “Plots” tab using this new Plot NFT to start farming XCH
Go to "Pool" menu in the left menu
If you already have a Plot NFT select "Change Pool" then enter https://pool.openchia.io
All our software (api, pool, bot, web, mobile) are open source and available on Github repositories.
All farmer participating in our pool are eligible in our giveaway! Tickets on farmer page, read more.
Have you asked yourself who are the people running Chia pools? Do you trust them?
We have more than 20 years of combined experience in the software development industry.
All our software is open source.
Find a native application on phone Android and iOS in your travels. Be alerted when blocks are found.
Get your reward as soon as possible with PPLNS distribution system. Only 1% fee, read more.
Please meet our partners, together for a better world.

They are offering cutting-edge cryptocurrency technology of today and tomorrow. Vivid Stake Pool allows you to stake in Cardano. If you deposit your Fiat Money on your bank account, you will receive 1-3 % profit per year which will be paid after at least a few months. In Cardano it is the opposite: you receive high profits as high as 5-8 % per year which is paid every 5 days!

OpenChia believes that in a future blockchain and cryptocurrency can exist without degrading the environment and helping make the world a better place. We believe Chia and Cardano can coexist to help make that happen. If you'd like to know more about Cardano and/or join a legitimate staking pool please visit Vivid Pool.
Earn XCH by referring your friends to this pool!
Refer your friends to this pool using the URL https://openchia.io?referrer=YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID. Replace YOUR_LAUNCHER_ID with the Launcher ID from your Plot NFT.

Have your friend join the pool and login to the pool website using the Plot NFT login link. He will confirm you are his referrer. (Referrer is filled automatically if he visited the website with your link)
You will receive 20% of the pool fee for every payment made to your friend. That value comes out of the pool and not from your friend reward!
How do I check my referrals?
Login to the pool website using your Plot NFT login link and go to the "Referrals" tab.
Use of good faith and don't refer yourself in any shape or form.
Do not attempt close loop of referral. e.g. A -> B -> C -> A.
We reserve the right to change fees for new referrals at any time.
Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
